QuestData.Title: Slightly Unstable
QuestData.Description: Looking good!$B$BNo, not you - my new mines. You're just a little full of yourself, aren't you? I, on the other hand, am absolutely brilliant! My intellect cannot be matched.$B$BWhat were we talking about? Oh yes, my new mines! New and improved... ready for whatever devious use Ricket has concocted.$B$BBe a $G good lad:doll; and go hand them off to Ricket, will you? She's right over there... it should be quite the epic journey, I'm sure. Be careful though, she's a little loopy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Jeer's Improved Land Mines to Ricket in K3.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, aren't these just the cutest little packets of destruction you've ever seen?!
